effect.name: Video Waveform Monitor
effect.description: The waveform monitor plots color component intensity. By default luminance only. Each column of the waveform corresponds to a column of pixels in the source video.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.m
Mode
parameter.comment:
In row mode, the graph on the left side represents
color component value 0 and the right side represents value = 255.
In column mode, the top side represents color component value = 0 and bottom side represents value = 255.

parameter.name: av.i
Intensity
parameter.comment:
Smaller values are useful to find out how many values
of the same luminance are distributed across input rows/columns

parameter.name: av.r
Mirror
parameter.comment:
In mirrored mode, higher values will be represented
on the left side for row mode and at the top for column mode.

parameter.name: av.c
Components
parameter.comment: Select the components to be displayed

parameter.name: av.o
Graticule Opacity
parameter.comment: Set the opacity of the graticule

parameter.name: av.s
Scale
parameter.comment: Set scale used for displaying graticule

parameter.name: av.t0
Tint 0
parameter.comment:
Only used with lowpass filter and when display
is not overlay and input pixel formats are not RGB

parameter.name: av.t1
Tint 1
parameter.comment:
Only used with lowpass filter and when display
is not overlay and input pixel formats are not RGB

parameter.name: av.input
Input Format
parameter.comment: Set input formats for filter to pick from
